parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the usage profile.

parameters.name: Configuration
parameters.description: A ProfileConfiguration object specifying the job and session values for the profile. SessionConfiguration (dict) --- A key-value map of configuration parameters for Glue sessions. (string) --- (dict) --- Specifies the values that an admin sets for each job or session parameter configured in a Glue usage profile. DefaultValue (string) --- A default value for the parameter. AllowedValues (list) --- A list of allowed values for the parameter. (string) --- MinValue (string) --- A minimum allowed value for the parameter. MaxValue (string) --- A maximum allowed value for the parameter. JobConfiguration (dict) --- A key-value map of configuration parameters for Glue jobs. MaxValue (string) --- A maximum allowed value for the parameter.

nested_params.name: SessionConfiguration
nested_params.description: A key-value map of configuration parameters for Glue sessions.
